languages.text: Shots from this rifle make targets to run 2 cells away form the shooter. Also increases Burning, Bleeding and Toxin effects on the target by 10. Doesn't stack.

traits.locale_text: Shots from this rifle make targets to run 2 cells away form the shooter. Also increases Burning, Bleeding and Toxin effects on the target by 10. Doesn't stack.

languages.text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target suffers burning, bleeding, or toxin, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.
Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target suffers burning, bleeding, or toxin, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target suffers {g|f:8da2a947a1a8bc543b9e7a9cad054414}Burning{/g}, {g|f:8efe147110a46d2488c30447e7545f13}Bleeding{/g}, or {g|f:79aa52bbdf534f6c9bc5da0b4e463b66}Toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|f:8da2a947a1a8bc543b9e7a9cad054414}burning{/g}, {g|f:8efe147110a46d2488c30447e7545f13}bleeding{/g}, or {g|f:79aa52bbdf534f6c9bc5da0b4e463b66}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

languages.text: Cada impacto de esta arma obliga al objetivo a alejarse 2 casillas del tirador. Si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, el nivel de estos efectos aumenta en +10. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada impacto de esta arma obliga al objetivo a alejarse 2 casillas del tirador. Si el objetivo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, el nivel de estos efectos aumenta en +10. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: この武器が命中するたび、ターゲットを射撃手から2セル分遠ざける。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を受けている場合、これらの効果のレベルは+10増加する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: この武器が命中するたび、ターゲットを射撃手から2セル分遠ざける。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を受けている場合、これらの効果のレベルは+10増加する。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: 这把武器每次命中敌人时，都会将敌人朝远离射手的方向推开2格。如果目标受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}影响，则会使此类效果的强度等级提高10级。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器每次命中敌人时，都会将敌人朝远离射手的方向推开2格。如果目标受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}影响，则会使此类效果的强度等级提高10级。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Jeder Treffer dieser Waffe zwingt ein Ziel, vom Schützen 2 Zellen zurückzuweichen. Steht das Ziel unter dem Einfluss von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, erhöht sich die Stufe dieser Effekte um +10. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Treffer dieser Waffe zwingt ein Ziel, vom Schützen 2 Zellen zurückzuweichen. Steht das Ziel unter dem Einfluss von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, erhöht sich die Stufe dieser Effekte um +10. Nicht stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque coup porté par cette arme oblige la cible à s'éloigner de 2 cases du tireur. Si la cible souffre des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, le niveau de ces effets est augmenté de +10. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque coup porté par cette arme oblige la cible à s'éloigner de 2 cases du tireur. Si la cible souffre des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, le niveau de ces effets est augmenté de +10. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Попадание из этого оружия заставляет цель сместиться на 2 клетки от стрелка. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, уровень этих эффектов увеличивается на 10. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Попадание из этого оружия заставляет цель сместиться на 2 клетки от стрелка. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, уровень этих эффектов увеличивается на 10. Эффект не суммируется.

Попадание из этого оружия заставляет цель сместиться на 2 клетки от стрелка. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, уровень этих эффектов увеличивается на 10. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Bu silahın yaptığı her vuruş, hedefi nişancıdan 2 hücre uzağa sürükler. Hedef {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksine{/g} maruz kalmışsa bu etkilerin seviyesi +10 artar. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Every hit from this weapon forces a target to move 2 cells away from the shooter. If the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, the level of these effects increases by +10. Does not stack.
